section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Comite Europeen de Droit Rural, 'CEDR' (European Council for Rural Law)
relevant_communication:
Contributors to the bi-annual CEDR Congress 
 
Representations to UK Government and the UK devolved administrations on all agricultural and rural matters
goals__remit:
The Agricultural Law Association has been the UK’s largest inter-professional organisation devoted to the law and business of the countryside.  
 
We focus on the law in a non-partisan, apolitical way in order to promote its knowledge, understanding and development among those who advise rural businesses. 
 
The Association is also the largest member Association of the Comite Europeen de Droit Rural, 'CEDR' (European Council for Rural Law). 
 
Our members include the legal, surveying and accountancy professions as well as distinguished academics.
